Text: problem playing file, crashs media player, playback broken up on vlc player, tried mkvmerge, picture then ok but no sound help please.
Looks like these new 1013.45 MiB rips are very bad, better download web-dl from some share server, much better.
Skimmed through the file, quality seems fine.

I found the real issue discussed here: http://forum1.netgear.com/showpost.php?s=b743a30f20d9643b19f24323e58b8286&p=357731&postcount=28

I did his fix and works. Apparently IMMERSE is using a bugged muxer that specifies a sampling frequency of 0 in the audio track.

Ignore my rants in other threads about "mkv header compression"  :P
Why have you wrapped up this files in MKV it is a pain pain pain in the fundument.  PLEASE stick to .AVI
Please ignore Velcroman and continue with the MKV's.  they are better for surround sound and higher quality picture in the same size file.  Thank you.
